ResourceHeader.ResourceName: Observation data of the lower troposphere taken by the boundary layer radar (BLR)-3 at Kototabang (GIF format)
ResourceHeader.Description: The time-height plots of the three components of wind velocity (zonal, meridional and vertical winds), the echo power and spectral width of five radar beams in the troposphere between 1 and 6 km taken by the boundary layer radar (BLR)-3 at Kototabang, Indonesia (0.20S, 100.32E, 865m MSL). The plots are stored in the gif file named (year)(month).(variable).gif for one month plot or (year)(month)(day).(variable).gif for one day plot. The variable abbreviations are wnd, pwr and wdt, which mean wind velocity, echo power and spectral width, respectively. Local time is used for time. The right panels of each image are 1-day or 1-month average profiles of each parameter as a function of height. The missing data are presented by white color.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: If you acquire Kototabang-BLR data, we ask that you acknowledge us in your use of the data. This may be done by including text such as Kototabang-BLR data provided by Research Institute for Sustainable Humanosphere of Kyoto University. We would also appreciate receiving a copy of the relevant publications.

TimeSpan.Note: Although the BLR-3 data can be open within a few of day after the observational date, the BLR-3 operation stops now due to the breakdown of signal analyzer.

DisplayData.Keyword: EARTH SCIENCE Atmosphere Atmospheric Boundary Layer Winds

Parameter.Name: year
Parameter.Description: Year in the form YYYY where YYYY = Gregorian Year AD.

Parameter.Name: month
Parameter.Description: Month in the form MMM where MMM = month of year (Jan, Feb,..., Dec).

Parameter.Name: day
Parameter.Description: Day in the form DD where DD = day of month (01-31).

Parameter.Name: time
Parameter.Description: Time in the form hh where hh = hour of day (0-23). Local time (UT+07:00:00) is used for time data.

Parameter.Name: wdt
Parameter.Description: Spectral width of beam 1-5. This width corresponds tp the half power full one.
